description: Installation of an air source heat pump in the rear garden and alterations to the fenestration and finish of the rear extension.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the end of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans;

Site Location Plan LO-A-01, Existing Site Plan EX-A0.01, Existing Ground Floor Plan EX-A1.01, Existing First Floor Plan EX-A1.02, Existing Second Floor Plan EX-A1.03, Existing Roof Plan EX-A1.04, Existing Elevations EX-A2.01, Existing Sections EX-A3.01, Site Plan PR-A0.01,  Proposed Ground Floor Plan PR-A1.01, Proposed First Floor Plan PR-A1.02, Proposed Second Floor Plan PR-A1.03, Proposed Roof Plan PR-A1.04, Proposed Elevations PR-A2.01, Proposed Sections PR-A3.01, Eaves FlushGlaze Detail Section Elevations 402-ASS-056 p1-3, Design and Access Statement 12/2024, Plant Noise Assessment Reference: 14023.RP01.PNA.0, Specification of Components, Fire Statement, Installation Manual

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
Condition : 3 - All new external works to the rear fenestration shall be carried out in materials that resemble, as closely as possible, in colour and texture those of the existing building, unless otherwise specified in the approved application. 

Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area in accordance with the requirements of policy D1 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017 and policy 2 of the Fortune Green West Hampstead Neighbourhood Plan 2015. 
Condition : 4 - Noise levels at a point 1 metre external to sensitive facades shall be at least 
10dB(A) less than the existing background measurement (LA90), expressed in 
dB(A) when all plant/equipment (or any part of it) is in operation unless the 
plant/equipment hereby permitted will have a noise that has a distinguishable, 
discrete continuous note (whine, hiss, screech, hum) and/or if there are distinct 
impulses (bangs, clicks, clatters, thumps), then the noise levels from that piece 
of plant/equipment at any sensitive faï¿½ade shall be at least 15dB(A) below the 
LA90, expressed in dB(A). 

Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining premises and the area 
generally in accordance with the requirements of policies A1 and A4 of the 
London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
Condition : 5 - Prior to use, machinery, plant or equipment at the development shall be 
mounted with proprietary anti-vibration isolators and fan motors shall be 
vibration-isolated from the casing and adequately silenced and maintained as 
such. 

Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the adjoining premises and the area 
generally in accordance with the requirements of policies A1 and A4 of the 
London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
Condition : 6 - Prior to first use of the air source heat pump hereby approved, the active cooling function shall be disabled on the factory setting and the air source heat pump shall be used for the purposes of heating only.

Reason: To ensure the proposal is energy efficient and sustainable in accordance with policy CC1 and CC2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
